test_scenarios.name: Successful Login
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the Saucelabs dashboard.

test_scenarios.name: Logout
steps: Navigate to the Saucelabs dashboard (assuming already logged in).
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is successfully logged out and redirected to the login page.

test_scenarios.name: Run a basic automated test
steps: Navigate to the Saucelabs dashboard (assuming already logged in).
Click the 'Live Testing' or 'Automated Testing' tab.
Select a pre-configured or basic browser/OS combination (e.g., Chrome on Windows 10).
Execute a simple automated test script (e.g., navigate to Google.com and verify the title).
test_scenarios.expected_result: The automated test runs successfully and reports a 'passed' status in the Saucelabs interface. A video recording of the test is available.
